name: Komperdell Nordic Classic Jr Poles
description: Good poles aren't complicated. These are adjustable for smaller hands, amde of durable but light aluminum, and will last long enough to pass on to the next budding skier.Shafts are 16mm 5083 aluminum alloy.Structured Nordic XC grips for comfy, secure control.XC standard baskets.Steel tips.Shorter length suits smaller adults and junior skiers.
